#labels Phase-Design
Tabs and design of settings page

= Introduction =

Wall settings page which is shown when we create and edit wall, will be separated to 6 different tabs
* General
* General style
* Form attributes
* Form style
* Post style
* General Post style

= Details =

== General tab ==
This tab will have general wall attributes
 # Name: Name of the wall. We should only except names that will be send with url.
 # Page Size
 # Allow Entries
 # Allow Read posts
 # Allow HTML
 # e-mail new posts
 # Show Latest posts first
